channel.title: Fuck 99 cooking, fuck runescape.Waste of time imo

item.title: Fuck 99 cooking, fuck runescape.Waste of time imo
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:45, topic:128625”]if that is so you could get 99 slayer with 125,000 trips (being that you dont use any accidentally)
damn that would suck, and your right it is a huge waste of time but isn’t rs a whole waste of time anyway?[/quote]

It would be a boring waste of time. At least RS is a mostly fun waste of time.

Read full topic

item.title: Fuck 99 cooking, fuck runescape.Waste of time imo
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:44, topic:128625”][quote author=Ooo Java link=topic=179260.msg1644072#msg1644072 date=1185991088]
Rofl, you do get xp when you hit with flowers, they changed it agggess ago…
And Zzzamorak uses recoils, with aggressive npcs
[/quote]

Like I said, it would be completely futile to use recoils, because you could only get 104 exp per load of salmon. You would have to choose an npc that is close to a bank, and it would be a huge waste of time.[/quote]
if that is so you could get 99 slayer with 125,000 trips (being that you dont use any accidentally)
damn that would suck, and your right it is a huge waste of time but isn’t rs a whole waste of time anyway?

Read full topic

item.title: Fuck 99 cooking, fuck runescape.Waste of time imo
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“Ooo Java, post:41, topic:128625”]Rofl, you do get xp when you hit with flowers, they changed it agggess ago…
And Zzzamorak uses recoils, with aggressive npcs[/quote]

Like I said, it would be completely futile to use recoils, because you could only get 104 exp per load of salmon. You would have to choose an npc that is close to a bank, and it would be a huge waste of time.

exe626:

They don’t give exp, just like flowers(when you attack with flowers, you don’t get exp, WOW). Hitting 1-2 with flowers, and then taking a bit of dmg making them receive dmg in return.

I don’t see why. You definitely should get more exp than usual if you use flowers.

item.title: Fuck 99 cooking, fuck runescape.Waste of time imo
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:26, topic:128625”]uhh x.x
Lamps exp depends on your level(level 1 you get 10 exp, level 5 you get 50, level 10 you get 100, ect). And you don’t only get them once a month, you get them randomly, you can get 100,000 in a month, or you could get none in a month.[/quote]

Yep, and plus, since we don’t know how long zzzamorak has been around, the month argument really has no basis.

Read full topic
item.source: Fuck 99 cooking, fuck runescape.Waste of time imo

item.title: Fuck 99 cooking, fuck runescape.Waste of time imo
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

1337h4x:

Go blow yourself up, lamp’s only give like 500 experience and you get them once a month.

uhh x.x
Lamps exp depends on your level(level 1 you get 10 exp, level 5 you get 50, level 10 you get 100, ect). And you don’t only get them once a month, you get them randomly, you can get 100,000 in a month, or you could get none in a month.

Read full topic
item.source: Fuck 99 cooking, fuck runescape.Waste of time imo

item.title: Fuck 99 cooking, fuck runescape.Waste of time imo
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

1337h4x:

Go blow yourself up, lamp’s only give like 500 experience and you get them once a month.

With a full load of the salmon or higher, you can only take 261 damage MAX at level 3. Therefore you only deal 26 damage. That’s 104 exp for a full load of salmon. Think about how long that would take.

Zzzamorak has 179,675,092 exp and 1481 total levels. If he put most lamps he got towards slayer, he could easily get 40.

Read full topic
